brokers.description: list of brokers part of this cluster

clusterSize.description: how many nodes are in the cluster

partitionsCount.description: how many partitions are spread across the cluster

replicationFactor.description: configured replication factor for this cluster

nodeId.description: unique (within a cluster) node ID for the broker

partitions.description: list of partitions managed or replicated on this broker

partitionId.description: the unique ID of this partition

role.description: the role of the broker for this partition

Partition_PartitionBrokerRole.description: Describes the Raft role of the broker for a given partition

Partition_PartitionBrokerHealth.description: Describes the current health of the partition
